subject: Labor and Jobs
Basketball
Lockouts
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: Despite perceptible movement on the economic issues, union leaders sounded the alarm after a five-hour bargaining session in which N.B.A. owners rejected a new, informal proposal by the union.
snippet: Despite perceptible movement on the economic issues, union leaders sounded the alarm after a five-hour bargaining session in which N.B.A. owners rejected a new, informal proposal by the union.
